text: niccayamāka allāh uṅkaḷai vilakkuvatellām mārkka viṣayattil uṅkaḷiṭam pōr ceytu uṅkaḷai uṅkaḷ illaṅkaḷai viṭṭum veḷiyēṟṟi, nīṅkaḷ veḷiyēṟṟappaṭuvataṟku utaviyum ceytārkaḷē, attakaiyavarkaḷai nīṅkaḷ nēcarkaḷāka ākkik koḷvatait tāṉ - eṉavē, evarkaḷ avarkaḷai nēcarkaḷākkik koḷkiṟārkaḷō avarkaḷtām aniyāyam ceypavarkaḷ
